transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan Nadeem sir good evening.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji good evening.
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se. Batao na batao na. Haan ji sir main keh raha tha sir wo mam se to baat ho gaya sir aapka?
Customer: Hello. Baat to ho gaya tha wo to haan unhone yahi bola hai ki hum logon ne aage forward kar diya hai hamara yahi feedback hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm. Jo aapne bola wahi unka one to one solution to kahin se nahi aaya mere paas.
Executive: Haan ji sir jo matlab dekhiye sir jo feedback hamare paas aata hai sir wahi cheez maine bhi update kiya tha sir. Aur jo reverse ka aap keh rahe the na sir wo hamare paas hota nahi hai sir uska. Agar hota to definitely main aapka.
Customer: Wahi hai main keh raha hun maine bhi unko yahi samjhane ki koshish kari but wo samjhe nahi aap le de ke baat wahi aa rahi hai phir.
Executive: Nahi bilkul Nadeem sir agar aisa aapka reverse ka facility hota na sir to definitely main wo aapka karwa deta sir main aapko mana hi nahi karta sir.
Customer: Haan theek hai baat sahi hai but kuch to karo mere yahan to fresh hai na wo buyers ke call bhi nahi aa rahe kya karun main aap logon ko mere ko to wo samajh mein nahi aa raha. Aap log bole the na ki aap kaam karte raho kaam karte raho mera activation itna achcha hai uske baad bhi mere ko fresh hai na buyers call nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir agar main buyer call ka baat karun na sir to actually na is product line mein jo aapka competition hai na sir khas karke Makrana location pe sir bahut jyada hai sir is product line mein sir. Aap khud bhi check karenge sir kyunki agar aap as a buyer ka aap journey aap bhi check karoge sir to aapko hi pata hai Nadeem sir ki koi bhi buyer sir jayega to sir wo google mein ja ke aapka product search karega sir. Agar main kehta hun ki marble wash basin manufacturing dale ya manufacturer supplier kuch bhi wo dale sir aur agar Makrana city se bhi koi buyer search karega na sir to Makrana location pe bhi aap dekhoge na sir to is product line mein jo khas karke aapka product hai sir usme competition bahut jyada hai sir. Aur bahut sare supplier na sir hamare premium service jo hamari TrustSeal service aati hai sir wo service ko leke na sir apna visibility wahan pe rakh rakha hai sir. Kyunki buyer kya karega sir 10 logon se check kiya sir 10 logon ka profile dikh raha hai unko call karega unka requirement sir fulfill ho jayega sir. Isse ek mujhe ye main issue aapka lag raha hai sir aapke profile mein sir. Agar aap mujhe video meeting mein ek bar time bhi dijiyega na sir main jyada aapka time nahi lunga sir. 10 se 15 minute ka main aapka time lunga sir total main buyer ka journey ke according har ek product wise aapka main competition show karunga sir Makrana pe ki buyer aap tak maximum kyun nahi reach kar pa raha hai kahan pe issue aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Wo to sir theek hai na ki jaise for example humne koi suggest kar diya ki aap aise kar sakte ho wo to koi matlab nahi rahega wo to excuse ho jayega ki ye ye problems hai.
Executive: Nahi main excuse aapko nahi bata raha hun sir main dekhiye sir jo cheez genuine hai sir wo cheez main aapko bata raha hun sir competitor hai sir aapke product mein. But aisa nahi hai ki jo aapka current service chal raha hai sir isme bhi sir ki matlab business wagera nahi hai business wagera hai sir but kisi kisi product line mein jahan pe sir competition jyada hai na sir wahan pe sir hume hamesha hum yahi suggest karte hain client ko ki aap maximum sir service ko use kijiye buyleads wagera consume kijiye sir definitely aapke sir visibility sir improve hogi sir. Ye cheez hum hamesha suggest karte hain.
Customer: Aap dekhte hain aap bahut main achche se use kar raha hun isko kafi time de raha hun aur aapke kehne pe aapne bola tha ki haan theek hai aap thoda bahut isko aur time de main aur time de raha hun ab to time bhi ho gaya dhai se teen mahine ke hone ko aa rahe hain but mere yahan se koi lead aisa wo nahi aa raha hai ki matlab jaise hi main discussion karun lead close ho jaye wo phir wahi aate hain ki matlab bas checking ke liye aur koi kuch nahi hai. Achcha pehle main IndiaMART mein kaam kar raha hun wahan pe aisa hota tha ki jaise hi hum log baat karte the genuine one to one baat hui lead close but is bar aisa kuch bhi nahi ho raha bahut matlab headache ho raha hai wo wala scene ho gaya.
Executive: Haan haan haan. Haan.
Executive: Nahi sir maine bhi aapka consuming pattern bhi dekh check kiya hai sir ki aap zero to four hour ke aas pass ke buyleads bhi sir 90% ke aas pass plus hi sir consume karte ho sir jyada purana bhi buyleads aapka consume karte ho sir wo maine totally check kiya hai sir aapka. 97% aapne November mein bhi check consume kiya hai 98% ke aas pass aapne October mein bhi check kiya hai sir consume kiya hai sir wo maine clearly check kiya hai sir apart from that sir ki 100% buyleads bhi aap use kar rahe ho sir aisa nahi ki buyleads bhi aap kam use kar rahe ho 100% ke aas pass aap buyleads bhi consume kar rahe ho.
Customer: But ulti baat ye hai mere yahan lead ka conversion nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. To wo usko leke main kafi frustrated hun kafi frustrated hun.
Executive: Nahi sir main agree kar raha hun sir kyunki jo hamara platform hai sir aapko hi pata hai sir ki hum buyer ka detail aapko de sakte hain sir hai na sir aapne mujhe ek buyer ka feedback diya sir maine same cheez apne buyleads team ko escalate kiya sir aur wahan se jo update aaya sir wahi cheez maine bhi aapko update kiya sir after that aapne bola ek bar apne senior se bhi baat kare to maine bhi aapka call escalate kiya sir.
Customer: Koi matlab nahi hai wahi aake yahi baat bolte koi bhi senior ho achcha hai aap wo last mein ja ke yahi baat bolte ki ye online platform hai hum log to bas visibility kar sakte hain iske alawa hamare paas koi wo nahi hai to visibility kar raha hai unhone aap kuch bhi nahi kar raha visibility to main khud hi kar raha hun ispe but uske baad bhi cheeze nahi aa rahi khair koi na aap jo sabhi hai ab chalna hi padega nahi to phir changes karna padega package ka jo bhi kuch hai.
Executive: Haan ek kaam kijiye na sir agar possible hoga na dekhiye sir agar aap aaj free hain to aaj ka time bhi de sakte hain kal ka hai to kal ka bhi koi time aap de sakte hain sir uske according main ek bar video meeting bhi rakh leta hun sir agar kuch bhi category wagera mein mujhe agar thoda sa correction wagera lagta hai sir to aap hume bataiyega uske according main category bhi hum change kar lenge agar kuch category aur bhi hum add kar sake sir aapke product line mein jiske buyleads aur inquiry hamare paas generate ho rahi hai one to one ek bar hum discuss kar lenge sir unke bhi detail aap dijiyega to wo bhi hum aapke as a product section mein add kar denge sir ye cheez main aapka totally kar sakte hain sir. Saath hi saath ek bar hum competitor section mein bhi check kar lenge hai na sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan ek bar aap free ho ke mujhe call kijiye ga main apne number se bhi na aapko hi likh ke bhej de raha hun theek hai sir aapko jaise bhi suitable lagta hai kal ka koi bhi time aap mujhe bataiyega baki sir abhi aapka complaint sir raise tha haan aapka complaint raise tha sir agar abhi aapka permission ho to main usko close kara dun sir already sir paanch din ho gaye unka.
Customer: Wo to kara dijiye mujhe batao aap logon ko to pata hi rahega.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Baki main aapko whatsapp pe na haan baki main aapko whatsapp pe hi likh ke bhej raha hun but request hoga sir aap mujhe ek schedule time jarur bataiyega ek bar hum connect karte hain sir kya pata kuch better ho jaye sir.
Customer: Karte hain sir dekhte hain ek bar jo bhi kuch hai.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai main aapko hi likh ke bhej raha hun ye number aapka whatsapp pe available hai na sir?
Customer: Haan mera yahi number hai.
Executive: Chaliye main aapko likh ke bhej raha hun sir aap mujhe jaise bhi free hote hain na ya mujhe kal ka koi time bata dijiyega to main ek confirmation call kar lunga aapko sir us time pe.
Customer: Theek hai isme thoda product wagera add karne padenge jo bhi kuch hoga dekh ke kya karna hai kar sakte hain apan best.
Executive: Hmm hmm bilkul bilkul sir abhi aap IndiaMART even main aapko na category wise bhi dikha dunga ki kya buyleads hamare paas sir approve ho rahe hain aur kuch competitor aap bataiyega uska bhi ek bar hum category check kar lenge sir ki unhone kya add kiya hua hai sir kya requirement aa raha hai unke paas inquiry wagera.
Customer: Haan done done.
Executive: Theek hai na to main aapko hi likh ke bhej de raha hun abhi theek hai.
Customer: Bhej dijiye bhej dijiye.
Executive: Okay Nadeem sir thank you sir.
Customer: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- No buyer calls, lead conversion is low.

- Frustrated with the lack of lead conversion.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss competition.

- Agreed to check and potentially adjust categories.

- Agreed to add product sections.

- Agreed to close the raised complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide a suitable time for a call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, competition, product category, visibility
